## Mobile Saunas



We are experienced in designing and building high quality mobile saunas that
offer an exceptional sauna experience wherever you or your business go, be
that remote mountain trails or bustling beaches.

There are two standard trailer sizes we usually use for our mobile saunas,
however, we are not limited to these and can work with you to create a bespoke
trailer base. Examples of floor plans for our larger and smaller standard
trailer sizes are available to view below, though these are completely
customisable, giving you the freedom to design your ideal mobile sauna.







* * *



# 8 Person Mobile Sauna (pictured)











### Wood-fired Sauna Stove

Max. length of firewood - 400mm  
Heats up to 70° Celsius in 90 minutes  
Heater output - 17kW  
Max. stone capacity - 90kg

### Sauna Dimensions

Length: 4.8m _  
_Width: 2.55m _  
_Length including trailer bar: 6.5

  * ###  Features 

Comfortably seats 7-8 people

Large double-glazed picture-style window

Built-in private changing area

Fitted with a HUUM 12kW wood-fired stove

Fitted with a solar panel, inverter and charger for the off-grid lighting
supply

Subtle warm white LED down-lighting

Knot-free thermally modified ash two-tier bench seating

Insulated with British sheep's wool, with a wall thickness of 165mm

Built-in unique vapour barrier

Includes the bespoke made trailer, fully galvanised and painted with self
levelling jacks on each corner, a fold-down tailgate access step and security
removable hitch

Example Floor Plan

PRICE  
£62,000 (+VAT)

Get In Touch





* * *





# 5 Person Mobile Sauna









### Wood-fired Sauna Stove

Max. length of firewood - 350mm  
Heats up to 70° Celsius in 75 minutes  
Heater output - 12kW  
Max. stone capacity - 90kg

### Sauna Dimensions

Length: 3.7m _  
_Width: 2.55m _  
_Length including trailer bar: 5.05m

  * ###  Features 

Seats 4-5 people

Large double-glazed picture-style window

Built-in private changing area

Fitted with a HUUM 12kW wood-fired stove

Fitted with solar panel, inverter and charger for the off-grid lighting supply

Subtle warm white LED down-lighting

Knot-free thermally modified ash two-tier bench seating

Insulated with British sheep's wool, with a wall thickness of 165mm

Built-in unique vapour barrier

Includes the bespoke made trailer, fully galvanised and painted with self
levelling jacks on each corner, a fold-down tailgate access step and security
removable hitch

Example Floor Plan

PRICE  
£54,000 (+VAT)

Get In Touch



View Mobile Gallery

Get In Touch

<

* * *

### _Featured in:_









Heartwood Saunas

Machynlleth,

United Kingdom

info@heartwoodsaunas.com

Hours

Mon 9am-6pm

Tue 9am-6pm

Wed 9am-6pm

Fri 9am-6pm

Sat Closed

Sun Closed

## Keep up-to-date

To receive our quarterly newsletter filled with news, tips, interesting
articles, and updates about our events, products, and offers, please submit
your details below.  
An email will be sent to your inbox asking you to confirm your interest, so we
know you’re not a robot!

First Name

Last Name

Email Address

Sign Up

Our newsletter is sent out 4 times a year only.  
We do not share your data.  
You can unsubscribe at any time.

Thank you!
